config_description: GC Pauses greater than 200 ms will be logged at INFO level This threshold can be adjusted to minimize logging if necessary
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' is used to log GC pauses greater than the specified threshold in milliseconds at the INFO level. This threshold can be adjusted to control the amount of logging for GC pauses.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever a Garbage Collection event occurs and the pause duration exceeds the specified threshold in milliseconds.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' configuration option is that it affects the amount of logging generated for GC pauses. Setting a higher threshold will result in fewer log entries for GC pauses, while setting a lower threshold will increase the frequency of log entries for GC pauses.
